conversation.text:
Based on your preferences for short movies, I would like to recommend three options from the list provided:

1) The Secret of My Success (2006)
Starring: Mia Wasikowska, Hayley Atwell, Jane Adams, Rufus Sewell, Charlotte Rampling
A story about a young woman who rises to success in her career as a police officer. She faces challenges and obstacles along the way, but ultimately she succeeds in achieving her goals and aspirations.

2) Restless (2006)
Starring: Mia Wasikowska, Hayley Atwell, Jane Adams, Rufus Sewell, Charlotte Rampling
A story about a young woman who is restless and cannot find peace in her life. She spends most of her time searching for answers and trying to make sense of the world around her.
3) Freeheld (2015)
Starring: Josh Charles, Steve Carell, Luke Grimes
An inspiring story about two people, Laurel Hester and Stacie Andree, who are fighting against injustice in their own lives. They face many challenges and obstacles along the way, but ultimately they succeed in achieving their goals and aspirations.
I hope these recommendations suit your preferences for short movies.
